```{r}
K <- 50 # number of columns of Y
J <- 200 # number of columns of X
J0 <- 75 # number of columns of X actually contribute
n <- 500 # number of samples

B <- matrix(rnorm(J * K), J, K)
B[sample(J, J0), ] <- 0
X <- matrix(rnorm(n * J), n, J)

Y <- X %*% B + matrix(10 * rnorm(n * K), n, K)
test <- cv.glmnet(x = X, y = Y[, 1])

R <- matrix(runif(K * K, 0, 0.5), K, K)
R <- R + t(R)
R[abs(R) < .7] <- 0
```
